body: Dear all, I got the following error message when trying to update the LB+HB components used in the current GH file. I've already updated the LB+HB installed on the computer. Appreciate if you can kindly advise what's the source of this error. Thank you! -Ji [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/FO0yl-aGNNJOzAKvo9tFzoDN0Raq9LlsxF4MPxkuR05Frk64WIxHLg70IxRXtad6dAT4CAZYvW-kv4SemI-AtlNGWmNORETV/Image5.png)

replies.body:
... OK, let me reply myself:



Line 117 in the **updateLadybug** component is to check components inside cluster, and it is not able to access the one of the clusters which is **password protected**.



Removing the password of the cluster solves the problem.



Maybe we can add a "cluster password protection" check in the updateLadybug component...?



- Ji
This new component should address this issue: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1723916](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1723916)
